name: King Charles III Britannia One Ounce Gold Coin 2023
description: The 2023 Charles III one ounce gold Britannia coin, sourced directly from The Royal Mint. This coin contains 1 troy ounce of pure, 999.9 fine gold. It is the first Britannia coin with the new portrait of His Majesty, King Charles III by Martin Jennings.

name: King Charles III Britannia One Ounce Silver Coin 2023
description: Due to the accession of His Majesty King Charles III The Royal Mint have launched a special second Britannia coin in 2023 featuring the effigy of the new King by Martin Jennings. These 2023 King Charles III Britannia silver coins contains 31.1 grams of fine silver at a purity of 999 parts per thousand. The 2023 Charles III 1oz silver Britannia coin is a legal tender coin in the UK, with a value of Â£2 and is therefore exempt from Capital Gains Tax.
